# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which holds immense value to you, just like it does to us. Considering its exceptional quality and the benefits it offers, we believe it's worth every penny of the $8,000. This is an exclusive opportunity tailored specifically for you. We understand that such a high-value item might require careful consideration, so we are offering you a special introductory price of $7,500. This offer is valid for a limited time only. Should you choose to accept, not only will you be securing a remarkable investment for yourself, but you'll also be enjoying the best deal possible. If you have any questions or need more information, please don't hesitate to reach out. Looking forward to your positive response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $7,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $7,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $8,000
